text:
@SenSchumer There was never a claim that it "prevents" covid19. 

The "serious side effects" are extremely rare with proper dosage (200mg x2/day).

Your chances to survive covid19 with a comorbidity are greatly reduced

HCQ is an immunomodulator that suppresses a cytokine reaction to covid19
